text: The Armenian Army is the army of Armenia. Armenia has sent around 1,500 officers to be trained in Greece and Russia over the past years. Since the end of the Nagorno-Karabakh War, Armenia has made the army boost the defense and help defend Nagorno-Karabakh from a possible new attack by neighboring Azerbaijan. ==Related pages== * Military history of Armenia * Armed Forces of Armenia * Armenian Air Force * Armenian Air Defense * Nagorno-Karabakh Defense Army * 2020 Nagorno-Karabakh conflict == Other websites == * Military Parade in Stepanakert, Artsakh * Armenian Military Photo Gallery Category:Military of Armenia Category:Armies Category:1992 establishments in Armenia
title: Armenian Army
